attributes.action: Create a single office, with UK-wide coverage, to handle customer complaints to rail companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In respect of problems related to rail journeys in the UK (such as delays and ticket refunds), it is often necessary to contact the offices of several train, and infrastructure, companies. It often takes several attempts to establish who is responsible for what. 

The law should be amended such that it provides for the creation of a single point of contact for all related issues arising. This office should be responsible for establioshing the responsible party and co-ordinating customer redress within a reasonable time.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
